meanings.definition: People who engage in drinking and partying.
meanings.sent1: The carousers at the party were laughing and having a good time.
meanings.sent2: Last night, a group of carousers gathered at the bar for a night of fun.
meanings.sent3: The carousers decided to have a toast to celebrate their friendship.
meanings.sent4: The carousers were like bubbles of joy, floating around the room.
meanings.sent5: The image of the carousers dancing under the disco ball was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who participate in revelry and merrymaking.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, the carousers paraded through the streets with music and laughter.
meanings.sent2: The carousers cheered and clapped as the magician performed his tricks.
meanings.sent3: The carousers' laughter echoed through the night, filling the air with joy.
meanings.sent4: In the meadow, the carousers seemed to be part of a colorful painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the carousers celebrating together warmed everyone's hearts.
